prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with vibrant blue skin and a unique serpentine shape.
Show me a Pokemon that combines features of an eel and a fish, with a striking color palette.
Imagine a water-dwelling Pokemon that emits electric shocks, featuring bright red and blue colors.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a sea creature, with distinct fins and a twisty body.
Make a Pokemon that is playful and mischievous, showcasing a mix of blue and red hues.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in water and has a unique, flowing design with bright colors.
Generate a Pokemon with an eye-catching design, featuring aquatic traits and electric abilities.
